Class IpAddress

  • java.lang.Object
    • IpAddress

  •  class IpAddress
extends java.lang.Object
    the IpAddress class handles ip address including functionalities such as whether two ip addresses are in the same network

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      (package private) byte[] ipAddr
      contains the ip address in byte format

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      IpAddress(byte[] ip)
      receives an ip address in array of bytes format and stores in instance variable ipAddr
      IpAddress(java.lang.String ipString)
      receives an ip address in string format and stores it in instance variable ipAddr

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      byte[] getBytes()
      returns ip address in array of bytes format
      IpAddress getNetworkAddress(int mask)
      calculates the network address of the ip address from supplied subnet mask
      java.lang.String getString()
      return ip address in String format
      boolean sameIp(IpAddress ip)
      checks whether the supplied instance of IpAddress has the same ip address as that of the invoking instance
      boolean sameSubnet(IpAddress ip, int mask)
      checks whether the supplied instance of IpAddress has ip address which is in the the same network as that of the invoking instance

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

      • getNetworkAddress

        public IpAddress getNetworkAddress(int mask)
        calculates the network address of the ip address from supplied subnet mask
        Parameters:
        mask - subnet mask
        Returns:
        IpAddress class having ip address set to the network address

      • sameSubnet

        public boolean sameSubnet(IpAddress ip,
                 int mask)
        checks whether the supplied instance of IpAddress has ip address which is in the the same network as that of the invoking instance
        Parameters:
        ip - instance of IpAddress
        mask - subnet mask
        Returns:
        true if the supplied instance of IpAddress has ip address which is in the the same network as that of the invoking instance and false otherwise

      • sameIp

        public boolean sameIp(IpAddress ip)
        checks whether the supplied instance of IpAddress has the same ip address as that of the invoking instance
        Parameters:
        ip - instance of IpAddress class
        Returns:
        true if the supplied instance of IpAddress has the same ip address as that of the invoking instance and false otherwise
